en: He prides himself on his learning.

en: He was apt to boast of his knowledge.
zh: 他老爱显摆自己懂得多。

en: He has not only learning but experience.
zh: 他不光有学问，还有经验。

en: He is a learned man.
zh: 他是个很有学问的人。

en: He is enjoying his school life.
zh: 他挺享受校园生活的。

en: He regrets having neglected his studies in his school days.
zh: 他后悔上学那会儿没好好念书。

en: He is very glad that his school life is going well.
zh: 他很高兴自己的校园生活挺顺心的。

en: I hear he is to go abroad for study as soon as he graduates from school.
zh: 我听说他一毕业就要出国留学。

en: He made a figure in his school days.
zh: 他上学那会儿可是个风云人物。

en: He was anxious to finish school and make his own way in the world.
zh: 他急着毕业，好去社会上闯荡。

en: His job had already been settled when he left school.
zh: 他还没毕业，工作就定好了。

en: After he left school, he went to London.
zh: 他毕业以后去了伦敦。

en: He set up the school.
zh: 这所学校是他办的。

en: He was absent from school.
zh: 他没去学校。

en: He is absent from school.
zh: 他今天没来学校。

en: He is often absent from school.
zh: 他经常不去学校。

en: He often absents himself from school.
zh: 他老是逃学。

en: He often doesn't come to school.
zh: 他经常不来上课。

en: He doesn't have to go to school.
zh: 他不用去上学。

en: He bought some stationery at the school store.
zh: 他在学校商店买了点文具。

en: He was proud of his school record.
zh: 他对自己的成绩很自豪。

en: He did badly at school.
zh: 他在学校表现很差。

en: He is doing fine in school.
zh: 他在学校表现挺好的。

en: He knew more than all the school put together.
zh: 他懂的比全校人加起来都多。

en: He lives in the neighborhood of the school.
zh: 他就住在学校附近。

en: He is a member of the tennis club in our school.
zh: 他是我们学校网球社的。

en: He apologized to the teacher for coming to school late.
zh: 他因为迟到跟老师道歉了。

en: He is proud of never having been late for school.
zh: 他为自己从没迟到过感到自豪。

en: He is likely to be late for school.
zh: 他上学可能要迟到了。

en: He muttered complaints against the school.
zh: 他嘀咕着抱怨学校。

en: He had a traffic accident on his way to school.
zh: 他在上学路上出了车祸。

en: He was in time for school.
zh: 他赶上了上学时间。

en: He instructed students in history at school.
zh: 他在学校教历史。

en: He is doing very well at school.
zh: 他在学校表现特别出色。

en: Not only did he teach school, but he wrote novels.
zh: 他不仅在学校教书，还写小说。

en: He was made much of at school.
zh: 他在学校很受器重。

en: He wanted to teach English at school.
zh: 他想在学校教英语。

en: He regrets not having worked harder at school.
zh: 他后悔在学校的时候没更努力点。

en: He remained at the top of the class at school.
zh: 他在学校成绩一直是班里第一。

en: He does far better than you do at school.
zh: 他在学校表现比你强多了。

en: He was seeking to do well at school.
zh: 他一直想在学校表现得出色一点。

en: He came here before school was over.
zh: 他在放学前就过来了。

en: He lives within a stone's throw of the school.
zh: 他家离学校就几步路。

en: He is unable to concentrate on his academic work.
zh: 他没法专心学习。

en: He lives off campus.
zh: 他住在校外。

en: He turned to the left at the corner.
zh: 他在路口往左转了。

en: He buys and sells leather goods.
zh: 他是做皮革生意的。

en: He cannot be a slow learner.
zh: 他不可能学得慢。

en: He had an assured manner.
zh: 他态度很自信。

en: He has a firm belief.
zh: 他信念很坚定。

en: He is clever, no doubt, but he is cold, too.
zh: 他确实挺聪明的，但就是太冷淡了。

en: He is a famous man, to be sure, but I don't like him.
zh: 他确实很有名，但我并不喜欢他。

en: True, he likes to show off, but he is kind and generous.
zh: 虽说他爱显摆，但他这人挺善良也挺大方的。

en: I am sure of his honesty.
zh: 我敢肯定他很诚实。

en: It is true that he did his best, but he was not careful enough.
zh: 他确实尽力了，但就是不够细心。

en: He is a fool, and no mistake.
zh: 他绝对是个大傻瓜，一点没错。

en: No doubt he will bring the money on the appointed day.
zh: 他肯定会在约定的那天把钱带来的。

en: Certainly he is handsome and intelligent, but there is something about him that I can't like.
zh: 他确实又帅又聪明，但他身上总有些让我喜欢不起来的地方。

en: He did say so.
zh: 他确实是这么说的。

en: He contends that nuclear weapons are necessary for national defense.
zh: 他坚持认为，为了国防，核武器是必须的。

en: He jumped over the hedge.
zh: 他跳过了树篱。

en: He framed the picture he had bought on the street.
zh: 他把他从街上买的那幅画给装进框子里了。

en: He looks just like a skeleton.
zh: 他瘦得跟个骷髅架子似的。

en: He's so thin that he looks like a skeleton.
zh: 他太瘦了，看着就像皮包骨头。

en: While walking down a street, he ran into an old friend of his.
zh: 他在街上走着走着，碰巧遇到了个老朋友。

en: He expected to have seen her before he went out of town.
zh: 他本来打算在出城前见她一面的。

en: He was walking about in the town.
zh: 他在镇子里闲逛。

en: He doesn't seem to be heading for the town.
zh: 他看起来不像是要去镇上的样子。

en: He was ignorant of the fact that the town had been destroyed.
zh: 他还不知道那个镇子已经被毁了。

en: He is, on the whole, a satisfactory student.
zh: 总的来说，他是个挺不错的学生。

en: As a rule, he arrives at the office about eight-thirty in morning.
zh: 他通常早上八点半左右到办公室。

en: He cleared his throat.
zh: 他清了清嗓子。

en: He was established as Foreign minister.
zh: 他被任命为外交部长。

en: He protected his country from foreign invaders.
zh: 他保卫国家，抵抗外来侵略者。

en: I think he gets a passing mark as Foreign Minister.
zh: 我觉得他这个外交部长当得还算合格。

en: He is used to talking to foreigners.
zh: 他习惯跟外国人打交道。

en: He took little time getting ready to go out.
zh: 他没花多长时间就准备好出门了。

en: When he goes out, he asks me to keep an eye on his house.
zh: 他出门的时候，总让我帮他盯着点家。

en: He has gone out.
zh: 他出门了。

en: Every time he goes out, he drops in at the bookstore.
zh: 他每次出门都会顺便去趟书店。

en: He is not in.
zh: 他不在。

en: He's not in.
zh: 他不在家。

en: He is rich enough to buy a foreign-made car.
zh: 他很有钱，买得起进口车。

en: He is engaged in foreign trade.
zh: 他是做外贸的。

en: He has a foreign car.
zh: 他有一辆进口车。

en: He has been engaged in foreign trade for twenty years.
zh: 他做外贸已经二十年了。

en: He has a lot of foreign stamps.
zh: 他有很多外国邮票。

en: He was a foreigner and was treated as such.
zh: 他是个外国人，大家也就把他当外国人对待。

en: He is a foreigner, and ought to be treated as such.
zh: 他是个外国人，理应受到相应的对待。

en: He worked hard for the purpose of buying a foreign car.
zh: 他拼命干活就是为了买辆进口车。

en: In order to buy a foreign car, he worked very hard.
zh: 为了买辆进口车，他工作特别卖力。

en: He worked very hard so he could buy a foreign car.
zh: 他工作很努力，这样就能买得起进口车了。

en: He is well versed in foreign affairs.
zh: 他对外交事务很精通。

en: He is quick at learning a foreign language.
zh: 他学外语学得很快。

en: He went abroad, never to return.
zh: 他出国了，再也没回来。

en: He went abroad.
zh: 他出国了。

en: He decided to go abroad.
zh: 他决定出国。

en: He was determined to go abroad.
zh: 他下定决心要出国。

en: He has changed his mind about going abroad.
zh: 他改变主意了，不出国了。

en: He is eager to go abroad.
zh: 他急着想出国。

en: He has written lots of books about his experience abroad.
zh: 他写了很多关于他在国外经历的书。

en: He had the privilege of studying abroad for two years.
zh: 他有幸在国外留学了两年。

en: He just returned from abroad.
zh: 他刚从国外回来。

en: He is outgoing.
zh: 他性格挺开朗的。

en: He is wealthy in appearance but not in reality.
zh: 他看着挺有钱，其实没什么钱。

en: He had the appearance of a sportsman.
zh: 他看着像个运动员。

en: His appearance has changed so much that you may well not recognize him.
zh: 他变样太大了，你可能都认不出他来了。

en: He was hospitalized for a surgical operation.
zh: 他住院做手术了。

en: Besides being a surgeon, he was a famous writer.
zh: 除了是外科医生，他还是个有名的作家。

en: He addressed my full attention to the landscape outside.
zh: 他把我的注意力都引向了窗外的景色。

en: He tumbled down the stairs.
zh: 他从楼梯上摔下来了。

en: He ascended the stairs.
zh: 他上楼了。

en: He ran up the stairs.
zh: 他跑上楼了。

en: He jumped up the steps three at a time.
zh: 他三步并作两步地跳上了台阶。

en: He went up the steps slowly.
zh: 他慢慢地走上台阶。

en: He saw a horrible face at the top of the stairs.
zh: 他在楼梯顶端看到一张恐怖的面孔。

en: He advocated abolishing class distinctions.
zh: 他主张废除阶级差别。

en: He came downstairs.
zh: 他下楼了。

en: He practices medicine.
zh: 他是当医生的。

en: He will figure on inviting a lot of guests to the opening ceremony.
zh: 他打算请很多客人来参加开幕式。

en: He asked for samples of picture postcards.
zh: 他要了一些明信片的样张。

en: He brought the art of painting to perfection.
zh: 他把绘画艺术发挥到了极致。

en: He went to art school to study painting and sculpture.
zh: 他去艺术学校学绘画和雕塑。

en: He hung a picture on the wall.
zh: 他在墙上挂了一幅画。

en: He is fond of painting.
zh: 他喜欢画画。

en: Painting was the great love of his life.
zh: 绘画是他一生的最爱。

en: He has an eye for art.
zh: 他很有艺术眼光。

en: He is drawing a picture.
zh: 他在画画。

en: He decided to go to Paris for the purpose of studying painting.
zh: 为了学画画，他决定去巴黎。

en: He has an aptitude for painting.
zh: 他有绘画天赋。

en: He has a sharp eye for painting.
zh: 他对画作很有眼力。

en: He is known to everybody.
zh: 大家都认识他。

en: He is respected by everyone.
zh: 大家都挺尊敬他的。

en: He is respected by everybody.
zh: 每个人都非常尊重他。

en: He is worshiped as a god by everyone.
zh: 大家都把他当神一样崇拜。

en: He is hated by all.
zh: 大家都恨他。

en: He is hated by everyone.
zh: 人人都讨厌他。

en: He picked up the ash-tray.
zh: 他拿起了烟灰缸。

en: He is bent on buying the seaside villa.
zh: 他一心想买那栋海滨别墅。

en: He is a waiter in a seaside restaurant.
zh: 他在一家海边餐厅当服务员。

en: He crystallized salt from seawater.
zh: 他从海水中提取出了盐结晶。

en: He enjoyed a new life under the sea.
zh: 他在海底过上了新生活。

en: He has received a commission as a naval officer.
zh: 他被任命为海军军官。

en: When he left the navy, he found it hard to adjust to life ashore.
zh: 他退伍离开海军后，发现很难适应岸上的生活。

en: He walked along the shore.
zh: 他沿着岸边散步。

en: He gave up going abroad.
zh: 他放弃出国了。

en: He has experience of foreign travel.
zh: 他有出国旅游的经验。

en: He is saving money for a trip abroad.
zh: 他在攒钱准备出国旅游。

en: He likes to travel abroad.
zh: 他挺喜欢出国玩的。

en: He did not study abroad for nothing.
zh: 他这留学没白留。

en: He studied abroad.
zh: 他留过学。

en: It is said that he will go abroad.
zh: 听说他要出国了。

en: He knows a lot about foreign affairs.
zh: 他对国外的事儿了解挺多的。

en: He made up his mind to study abroad.
zh: 他下决心要出国留学。

en: He's afraid of the sea.
zh: 他怕大海。

en: He crossed over the sea.
zh: 他跨过了大海。

en: He rode a horse to the sea.
zh: 他骑马去了海边。

en: He was walking toward the sea.
zh: 他正朝着大海走去。

en: He faced toward the sea.
zh: 他面向大海。

en: He lives within a stone's throw of the sea.
zh: 他住的地方离海边就几步路。

en: He resolved to turn over a new leaf.
zh: 他决心改过自新。

en: He seems to have a fat purse.
zh: 他看起来很有钱。

en: He substituted for the injured player.
zh: 他替下了受伤的球员。

en: He received a large sum of money in compensation for his injury.
zh: 他拿到了一大笔伤残赔偿。

en: He suffered terrible pain from his injuries.
zh: 伤口让他疼得厉害。

en: He died from wounds.
zh: 他因伤重去世了。

en: He lives comfortably.
zh: 他日子过得挺舒坦的。

en: He lives in comfort.
zh: 他生活得很安逸。

en: His salary enables him to live in comfort.
zh: 他的工资足够让他生活得很舒服。

en: He lives for nothing but pleasure.
zh: 他这辈子就图个乐呵。

en: He attached a "Fragile" label to the package.
zh: 他在包裹上贴了个“易碎品”的标签。

en: He demanded a replacement for the broken part.
zh: 他要求把坏了的零件换个新的。

en: He tried to put the fragments of a broken vase together.
zh: 他试着把打碎的花瓶拼凑起来。

en: He fixed the broken table.
zh: 他修好了坏掉的桌子。

en: He found a broken camera.
zh: 他发现了一个坏掉的照相机。

en: It's all up with him.
zh: 他这下全完了。

en: He is beyond the chance of recovery.
zh: 他已经没救了。

en: He has no chance of recovering.
zh: 他好不起来了。

en: There's no chance that he'll recover.
zh: 他基本没可能康复了。

en: He is up and about again.
zh: 他又能下地走动了。

en: He meditated for two days before giving his answer.
zh: 他琢磨了两天才给出答复。

en: He often breaks into the middle of a conversation.
zh: 他说话总爱插嘴。

en: He is an office worker.
zh: 他是个上班族。

en: It seemed that he had visited the office.
zh: 好像他去过办公室了。

en: He spoke to me on behalf of the company.
zh: 他是代表公司来找我谈的。

en: He said in earnest that he would quit the company.
zh: 他很认真地说他要辞职。

en: He was still in his teens when he founded a company.
zh: 他十几岁的时候就创办了公司。

en: His old company gave him the shaft. But I admire the way he turned bad luck into good and did even better with his own business.
zh: 老东家坑了他，但我挺佩服他能化险为夷，自己创业干得更出色。

en: He submitted his resignation in protest of the company's policy.
zh: 为了抗议公司的政策，他递交了辞呈。

en: He traveled at the expense of the company.
zh: 他旅游的费用是公司出的。

en: He brought in over half of his company's sales, so he expected to be given a piece of the pie.
zh: 公司一半以上的业绩都是他跑出来的，所以他想分杯羹。

en: He embezzled the money from his office.
zh: 他挪用了公司的公款。

en: He works with me at the office.
zh: 他跟我是在同一个办公室工作的。

en: He's a friend from work.
zh: 他是我同事。

en: He is a big man in the company.
zh: 他在公司里是个大人物。

en: He set out on his career as a corporation lawyer.
zh: 他的职业生涯是从当一名公司律师开始的。

en: He pocketed the company's money.
zh: 他把公司的钱私吞了。

en: He is the cash-box for his company.
zh: 他是公司的“钱袋子”。

en: He worked day and night in the interest of his firm.
zh: 他为了公司的利益没日没夜地工作。

en: He has done much for his company.
zh: 他为公司做了很多贡献。

en: He goes to the office by car.
zh: 他开车去公司上班。

en: He had not been employed by the company two years before his linguistic abilities were recognized.
zh: 他进公司还不到两年，语言天赋就被大家发现了。

en: He is a valuable acquisition to our company.
zh: 他对我们公司来说可是个宝贝。

en: He must be working late at the office.
zh: 他肯定还在办公室加班呢。

en: He doesn't get along with anybody in the office.
zh: 他跟办公室里的谁都处不来。

en: He got an important position in the company.
zh: 他在公司里担任要职。

en: He occupies a prominent position in the firm.
zh: 他在公司里的地位举足轻重。

en: He holds a high position at the company.
zh: 他在公司职位很高。

en: He is always on the go in his office.
zh: 他在办公室里总是忙得团团转。

en: He suggested that the meeting be put off till Monday.
zh: 他建议把会议推迟到周一。

en: He absented himself from the meeting.
zh: 他缺席了会议。

en: He didn't attend the meeting.
zh: 他没去开会。

en: He was absent from the meeting.
zh: 开会时他不在。

en: I imagine he will be late for the meeting.
zh: 我想他开会得迟到。

en: He canceled the appointment to attend the meeting.
zh: 他为了去开会把预约取消了。

en: He attends meetings off and on.
zh: 他开会总是有时去有时不去的。

en: He won't be in time for the meeting.
zh: 他开会赶不上了。

en: He decided not to go to the meeting.
zh: 他决定不去开会了。

en: He prepared carefully for the meeting.
zh: 他为会议做了充分的准备。

en: He was careful not to disrupt the meeting.
zh: 他很小心，尽量不打断会议。

en: He tends to be late for meetings.
zh: 他开会老爱迟到。

en: He armed himself with all the facts before asking questions at the meeting.
zh: 他在会上提问前已经掌握了所有的事实。

en: He had a hard time making himself understood at the meeting.
zh: 他在会上费了好大劲才把意思表达清楚。

en: He stayed absolutely silent throughout the conference.
zh: 他在整个会议期间一言不发。

en: He suggested we should stop smoking at the meeting.
zh: 他建议开会时不要抽烟。

en: He limited the membership to twenty.
zh: 他把会员人数限制在二十人。

en: He has the privileges of membership.
zh: 他享有会员特权。

en: Illness prevented him from attending the party.
zh: 生病让他没能参加聚会。

en: Illness kept him from attending the party.
zh: 生病让他去不了聚会。

en: He couldn't attend the meeting because he was sick.
zh: 他因为生病没去成开会。

en: He called in to say he could not attend the meeting.
zh: 他打电话来说他不能去开会。

en: He presented himself at the meeting.
zh: 他出席了会议。

en: He makes friends with everybody he meets.
zh: 他跟见到的每个人都能交朋友。

en: He spoke to whomever he met.
zh: 他不管见到谁都会打个招呼。

en: He always says "Hello" when I see him.
zh: 每次我见到他，他都会跟我打招呼。

en: Every time I saw him, I found him to be taller.
zh: 我每次见到他，都觉得他长高了。

en: Every time he meets me, he brags about his car.
zh: 他每次见到我都要吹嘘一下他的车。

en: He furnished the hungry with food.
zh: 他给挨饿的人提供了食物。

en: He was born to be a painter.
zh: 他天生就是当画家的料。

en: He is a sort of painter.
zh: 他也算是个画家吧。

en: He turned his artistic gifts to good account by becoming a painter.
zh: 他充分发挥了自己的艺术天赋，当了一名画家。

en: He has a great talent as a painter.
zh: 他在绘画方面很有天赋。

en: He cannot be an artist.
zh: 他成不了艺术家。

en: He was a painter, as I knew from his appearance.
zh: 看那样子，我就知道他是个画家。

en: He is a painter.
zh: 他是个画家。

en: He had reached the limits of his patience.
zh: 他的耐心已经到了极限。

en: As he couldn't endure, he took to his heels.
zh: 因为受不了了，他拔腿就跑。

en: He expressed his thanks to us all.
zh: 他向我们大家表示了感谢。

en: He seems to be wary of us.
